p: Infusions were prepared by the addition of one tea bag (containing 1 g of plant mash) to 1 L of boiling distilled water followed by 15 min of incubation at room temperature (RT). For decoction, one tea bag was added to 1 L of RT distilled water and kept boiling for 30 min. The tea bags were removed and the infusions or decoctions were cooled at RT before storage at −80 °C until analysis.
